'''Discharge''' is an [[aura]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The blasts occur at 15-second intervals.
* A charging visual effect will appear 4 seconds before a blast occurs.

==Damage==
{{Environmental Damage|4|Discharge|truedamage=2}}
